normalised: Heard about the crazy home loan schemes popping up? Real estate's heating up faster than a tawa on Diwali! Banks like H D F C and S B I are throwing around offers like free chhole bhature on a Sunday.

unnormalised: Heard about the crazy home loan schemes popping up? Real estate's heating up faster than a tawa on Diwali! Banks like HDFC and SBI are throwing around offers like free chhole bhature on a Sunday.
normalised: Apparently, there's this new "Apna Ghar" scheme from I C I C I, offering rates starting at like six point eight percent till thirty first december two thousand and twenty four. Imagine that, owning a pad in Gurgaon! Even smaller N B F C s are getting in on the action, with flexible E M I s for first-time buyers, especially if you're looking at a two B H K near your office.

unnormalised: Apparently, there's this new "Apna Ghar" scheme from ICICI, offering rates starting at like 6.8% till 31/12/2024. Imagine that, owning a pad in Gurgaon! Even smaller NBFCs are getting in on the action, with flexible EMIs for first-time buyers, especially if you're looking at a 2BHK near your office.
normalised: But seriously, do your homework. Don't get swayed by the fancy ads with smiling families. Check the fine print, the processing fees (rupees five thousand could be the starting point!), and the hidden charges. Talk to your chacha ji who's a C A – he’ll know what’s up. Deadline for some offers is fifteenth november two thousand and twenty three at five P M!

unnormalised: But seriously, do your homework. Don't get swayed by the fancy ads with smiling families. Check the fine print, the processing fees (Rs. 5000 could be the starting point!), and the hidden charges. Talk to your chacha ji who's a CA – he’ll know what’s up. Deadline for some offers is 15/11/2023 at 17:00 hrs!
normalised: Also, remember, interest rates are volatile like Mumbai weather, so check the R B I's latest updates before signing on the dotted line at nine A M tomorrow. Happy house hunting!

unnormalised: Also, remember, interest rates are volatile like Mumbai weather, so check the RBI's latest updates before signing on the dotted line at 09:00 hrs tomorrow. Happy house hunting!
